description: This table contains information about happy hours at shops, including the shop's identifier, the month of the happy hour, and the number of staff in charge.

columns.HH_ID: Unique identifier for the happy hour event
columns.Shop_ID: Identifier of the shop hosting the happy hour
columns.Month: Month in which the happy hour takes place
columns.Num_of_staff_in_charge: Number of staff members in charge during the happy hour
